context: Luxury hotel chain implementing contactless services to enhance guest experience and meet post-pandemic expectations

request.purpose: Mobile check-in/check-out, digital room keys, contactless payments, and automated concierge services
request.justification: Guest surveys show 70% prefer contactless options, competitors already implementing

decision_process.outcome: Approved for 12-month rollout across all properties

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15% increase in guest satisfaction, 20% reduction in check-in time, improved competitive positioning
business_impact.projected_value: $1.2M additional revenue from higher occupancy and rates

lessons_learned: Pilot programs essential for technology adoption, comprehensive training critical for staff buy-in
